ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(Opportunity__r.Owning_Country__c = "Denmark", Opportunity__r.Owning_Country__c = "Faroe Islands"), TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type) <> "New Pan Euro", TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type) <> "Marketing/B2C Consultancy", TF_Annual_Net_Commission__c < 3724.4265)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An opportunity may not have a Net Commission below â‚¬500
